name: Stronger Together (Delta2Force)
description:
Hey! I wanted to spend one week making a really good game, ended up procrastinating a lot and this is what came out of it. But it's playable!

Controls & How to play
W A S D - Move Camera
Mouse - Draw Rectangle to select soldiers
L Shift + Mouse - Select soldiers without deleting the old selection
Right click - Command selected soldiers to move
Left click on arrow - Move to room
The soldiers automatically attack slimes by throwing rocks when they are near them. There are three types of rooms: Empty rooms, rooms with slimes, and rooms in which you gather new soldiers.

And that's the game! I'm sorry that it's so shameful.
